_metadata.description: Declarative issue detection rules for detectInitialIssues(). Each rule specifies event patterns (present/absent) and generates an issue when matched.

rules.message: ğŸ”´ WebView2 creation FAILED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_CreationFailure detected â€” check HRESULT and WebView2_CreationFailureExe for details

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Factory IPC connection to browser process FAILED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_FactoryConnectionError â€” browser process may not have started or crashed during connection

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Browser process CRASHED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_BrowserProcessFailure with exit_code â€” all WebView2 instances affected

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Renderer became UNRESPONSIVE
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_RendererUnresponsive â€” heavy JS or infinite loop suspected

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Process failure with non-zero exit code
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_ProcessFailureTypeWithExitCode â€” check exit code and process type

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Process failure with specific reason
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_ProcessFailureTypeWithReason â€” check failure reason

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Navigation request FAILED in browser
rules.evidenceTemplate: NavigationRequest::OnRequestFailedInternal â€” network/SSL/server error

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Navigation ID mismatch â€” event may be suppressed
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_DifferentNavigationId â€” about:blank suppression or stale navigation ID

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Event DROPPED â€” dispatch failed
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_DroppedEvent â€” event constructed but not delivered to host

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ No event dispatcher registered for event type
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_NoEventDispatcher â€” handler not registered before event fired

rules.message: ğŸ”´ WebView2 runtime version INVALID
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_Invalid_Version â€” runtime installation may be corrupted

rules.message: ğŸ”´ WebView2 runtime version TOO OLD for requested SDK features
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_version_too_old â€” update runtime or lower SDK version requirement

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Failed to launch browser process
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_LaunchProcess_Failed â€” check exe path, permissions, antivirus blocks

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Window initialization FAILED â€” possibly headless/service context
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_WindowImpl_Init_Failed â€” no interactive desktop available?

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Invalid window handle detected
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_InvalidWindow â€” parent window may have been destroyed

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ WAM authentication error
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebTokenRequestResultOperation_ActivityError â€” check HRESULT for network/auth details

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ HTTP response loading BLOCKED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_ResponseLoadingBlocked â€” content blocked by proxy, CORS, or CSP

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ DevTools Protocol method call FAILED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_CallCDPMethodFailed â€” CDP communication issue with renderer

rules.message: â„¹ï¸ Suspend memory collection cancelled (audio/video may be playing)
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_CollectSuspendMemoryCancelled â€” TrySuspend rejected

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Timed out waiting for descendant processes to exit
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_WaitForDescendantsTimeOut â€” processes not cleaning up after browser exit

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Process FORCIBLY TERMINATED after shutdown timeout
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_WatcherTerminateProcess â€” process did not exit gracefully

rules.message: â„¹ï¸ Service worker fell back to network (cache miss)
rules.evidenceTemplate: FetchHandlerEndToFallbackNetwork â€” SW did not serve from cache

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Incompatible WebView2 configuration detected
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_IncompatibleConfig â€” check for conflicting settings or environment

rules.message: ğŸ”´ First navigation after creation FAILED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_FirstNavigationFailed â€” initial page load did not succeed

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Shared memory allocation FAILED
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_CreateSharedMemoryRegionFailed â€” system may be low on memory

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Network response received but commit never happened
rules.evidenceTemplate: ThrottlingURLLoader::OnReceiveResponse present but DidCommitNavigation missing â€” response may be blocked or deferred

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ IFrame torn down mid-navigation â€” events will be silently dropped
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_DroppedEvent â€” frame destroyed during active navigation lifecycle
rules.notes: WebView2_IFrameNotFound is available after nav diagnostic PR merges. Until then, check WebView2_DroppedEvent + WebView2_FrameDetached patterns.

rules.message: ğŸ”´ WebView2 factory created but never acquired â€” possible shutdown race
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_FactoryCreate without WebView2_FactoryAcquired â€” another WV2 shutdown may be blocking

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Renderer process exited before navigation completed â€” likely renderer crash
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_ProcessExited detected without NavigationCompleted â€” check ProcessFailedKind (RenderProcessExited / FrameRenderProcessExitedFailure). Common cause: RendererAppContainer enablement on Low-IL apps

traceNotes.WebView2_NavigationCompleted: This is an API callback, not a standalone ETW event. In traces, look for WebView2_Event with the corresponding handler interface name.

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ GPU process exit detected â€” may cause visual artifacts or blank frames
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_ProcessExited with GPU process type â€” check edge://gpu logs. Common causes: WebGL OOM, context loss, driver incompatibility. GPU process auto-restarts but content may flash

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Service worker activation blocking navigation commit
rules.evidenceTemplate: ForwardServiceWorkerToWorkerReady present but DidCommitNavigation missing â€” SW force-update (CL 6619069) may be forcing reload on DevTools detach. WRR/CDP usage triggers unintended SW re-activation

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ WebView2 created successfully but no navigation was initiated
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2 initialization completed (Creation_Client â†’ Creation_Client_End) but no NavigationStarting â€” host app may not have called Navigate()

traceNotes.WebView2_NavigationStarting: This is an API callback, not a standalone ETW event. In traces, look for WebView2_Event with the corresponding handler interface name.

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ WebView2 event was dropped and never delivered to host
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_DroppedEvent â€” an event was generated by the runtime but silently dropped before reaching the host app. Check if event handler was registered

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ No event dispatcher available â€” events cannot reach host
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_NoEventDispatcher â€” the WebView2 client has no event dispatcher, so host events will be silently lost

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Renderer process is unresponsive â€” page is hung
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_RendererUnresponsive â€” renderer is not responding to IPC messages. Navigation and script execution will timeout

rules.message: ğŸ”´ Navigation ID mismatch â€” NavigationCompleted suppressed
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_DifferentNavigationId present without NavigationCompleted â€” the navigation completed in the browser but the client suppressed it because the nav ID didn't match. Common with about:blank ID reuse

traceNotes.WebView2_NavigationCompleted: This is an API callback, not a standalone ETW event. In traces, look for WebView2_Event with the corresponding handler interface name.

rules.message: ğŸŸ¡ Document state change was suppressed
rules.evidenceTemplate: WebView2_DocStateSuppressed â€” document state transition was intentionally suppressed. Common for initial about:blank navigation (initializing_navigation_id_)
rules.notes: WebView2_DocStateSuppressed removed (available when nav diagnostic PR merges).
